sourcesContent:
import { Component } from "@angular/core"; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from "@angular/forms"; @Component({ selector: "app-login-modal", templateUrl: "./login-modal.component.html", styleUrls: ["./login-modal.component.scss"], }) export class LoginModalComponent { form: FormGroup = this.formBuilder.group({ username: [ "", [Validators.required, Validators.minLength(2), Validators.maxLength(30)], ], email: ["", [Validators.required, Validators.email]], password: [ "", [Validators.required, Validators.minLength(2), Validators.maxLength(30)], ], }); constructor(private formBuilder: FormBuilder) {} selectedTabChange(event: any) { console.log(event); } login() { console.log(this.form.getRawValue()); } registration() { console.log(this.form.getRawValue()); } }
Email Please enter a valid email address Email is required Password Password should contain from 2 to 30 symbols Password is required
Username Username should contain from 2 to 30 symbols Username is required Email Please enter a valid email address Email is required Password Password should contain from 2 to 30 symbols Password is required
